Room.Name: Aquaduct
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a fresh water aquaduct which takes water to the temple.
Room.LongDescription: The sides of the aquaduct are covered with moss and feel slimy to the touch. The humidity down here is quite high, and any metal you may be carrying is probably starting to rust. You should probably feel assured that no doubt nothing could live down here. And no doubt you are as safe as if you were home in bed.
